overview: Annabelle finds herself alone and in need of a job after she walks in on her boyfriend with another woman. After reluctantly taking a job as a maid for a charming & handsome millionaire, Annabelle starts falling for her boss despite his cunning fiance's attempts to keep them apart. Soon enough Annabelle realizes that she has to clean up her life as well as the house.
tagline: An erotic modern day Cinderella story.
title: Romantic Encounters: Maid For Love
